Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Malibu in 1975...
Injured on 5/29/1976 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1979, off Eddie Harris (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1979, off Timothy Mixson (CBC)...
Injured on 6/4/1982 with a Stiff Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Plum Grove on 6/16/1983...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Manchester on 5/13/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/1/1985 to a 4-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 9 RBI against Lynchburg on 6/8/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1985, hitting .304 with 5 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 9/18/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1986, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1988, hitting .522 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/21/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $4,609,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1989, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Bay City on 7/22/1989...
Traded from Malibu to Capital City on 3/1/1991 (Going to CC: LF I. Graziano, P M. Daniel, P G. Mcnerney. Going to Mal: CF G. Jacobs)...
